# VisionDrive

> VisionDrive Technologies FZ-LLC is a UAE-based IoT company providing smart kitchen temperature monitoring solutions for commercial kitchens, ensuring Dubai Municipality food safety compliance.

## Company

- Name: VisionDrive Technologies FZ-LLC
- Website: https://visiondrive.ae
- Location: Ras Al Khaimah Free Zone, United Arab Emirates
- Email: tech@visiondrive.ae
- Phone: +971 55 915 2985

## Products

### Smart Kitchen Temperature Monitoring
Real-time NB-IoT temperature monitoring for commercial kitchens. Sensors with ±0.3°C accuracy, 5+ year battery life, IP67 waterproof. Automated Dubai Municipality compliance reporting, HACCP documentation, and instant danger zone alerts (5°C-60°C).

### Kitchen Owner Portal
Web dashboard for restaurant owners to monitor temperatures, receive alerts, generate compliance reports, and manage multiple locations.
